unit.creator: Philodemus || Verhasselt, Gertjan
unit.title: History of the Eleatic and the Atomistic Schools || Fr. 1 PHerc. 327 || Literary Translation

dsl.content: (several lines and some words lost) was/lived (some words lost) Democritus (some words lost) in the Silloi (some words lost) being a Lydian (some words and several lines lost)
